author: lego613master
title: Not exactly Mr. Gold, but...
review:
[Disclaimer: I do not technically own this set myself. However, my younger brother bought one for himself, and I took it upon myself to do a little review on it. Cheers.]

 

This gold minifigure keychain is one that will undoubtedly grab many a FOL's eye hanging on a rack in a LEGO store. I mean, it's gold, for crying out loud! Gold is cool, right?

Parts

As a keychain, this set, naturally, has only one part: the 'fig itself. It is fully compatible with normal LEGO bricks, and can be used as a normal minifigure. Although, of course, the large chain & keyring on top greatly hamper useability. For its intended use, as a keychain, the model is superb. It functions as all normal minifig keychains, and is nice for showing off.

Minifigures

Just a glued-together chrome gold basic minifig. As an alert looker may notice, the hands of the fig are, in fact, unchromed. They are a sort of bland yellow colour. As a owner may notice, this is true on the inside of the minifig's legs as well, implying that the fig was merely spraypainted at the factory, and not a really super-good quality figure.

One issue with the figure is that it has no accessories at all, no hat/hair/chestpiece/handheld object. This can somewhat detract from the fig, and even the solid gold can become a monotone after a while, what with little other eyecandy besides.

The build

LOL! Build=0 stars.

Overall opinion

If you like everything to be perfect, I think that the unpainted leg insides may be a bit of a bummer. Same goes for the lack of visual breakups. The rest of the minifig, however, is quite nice, and the gold colour is a winner.

author: Master_Wu
title: Very colorful!
review:
I really like this keychain because of it's simple color. I think it's nice to be able to purchase a golden minifigure for only $5 that is attached to a keyring. The downside of this product is that if you clip it to your keys or a backpack it will get really scratched up.

I like this keychain and would recommend it as a very nice display piece.
